title: Request: Another option when SQL fails to connect
author: LaurenceMillward
body_snippet:
Hi,

After playing around with the SQL settings i've managed to accidentally overwrite my whole database with a old connections file.

mRemoteNG failed to connect to the database so gave me the option of either using a connections file, or quitting the program. After choosing a connections file that I haven't used in a few months just so i can actually edit the SQL settings it it loaded into the application, I changed the SQL settings and BOOM, the whole database was overridden.
